website_summaries.verdict: A far-infrared lamp that offers longer treatment time and flexible, adjustable angles thanks to its gooseneck design. It's not to be used on bare skin, though.
pros: Far infrared lamp with adjustable lamp neck offers many angles of treatment
Provides up to 60 minutes of treatment at a time
Heat shield protects from direct contact
cons: Do not use on bare skin
wear light clothing as a barrier
Check measurements before buying, as it may not fit well on some desks

customer_reviews.title: Very effective tool
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit big but works wonderful. On every muscles pain, cold etc. I use it. It helps the body to heal much faster and muscles to release.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lahmann

customer_reviews.title: warm you up.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality,handy remote control. only hope the aft base can be a little heavier,make it more stable.that's why one star missing.
customer_reviews.author: Xborder

customer_reviews.title: It's great lamp i ever used
customer_reviews.text: It lessen my shoulder pain. Specially,timer function is very effective soulution. When ever I practice daily,I enjoy this lamp for my muscle relax
customer_reviews.author: J. Yoon

customer_reviews.title: Some say they love it....
customer_reviews.text: I sent this lamp to my family in New York City. They said, "We love it". What I did not understand is that this lamp only came with one bulb, which is used for Heat and Light Therapy. Is that correct? Other suppliers use a bright light for Light Therapy. I wish that it was clear there would only be (1) bulb sent and it does or doesn't provide for the bright light (Light Therapy). If it does not provide for both than I think it is too expensive for only the red bulb. I think it is positive that it does come with a 6 month guarantee, which is why I also chose it.
customer_reviews.author: donna fein-diaz

customer_reviews.title: Infrared Heat Lamp Desk
customer_reviews.text: My family and I have used this Lamp and we are absoluptly happy with the results and benefits of the Lamp. We play tennis and we use the lamp for tired and sore muscles. We are really happy with the purchased of this item. Thanks, Luis G Chirichigno
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: this lamp is very easy to use and works great on my lower back!very happy with this product...judy
customer_reviews.author: Jude Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Infrared Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Works like a champ. Glad I purchased it, the heating is sensational no matter where u intend to place it just be careful not to let it get too close
customer_reviews.author: richbuton

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: It fell on my butt and burned. Now I have a silver dollar size scar on my behind. Embarassing, but that is true.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: good product - recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product of this caliber I found on the market for about This is the only product of this caliber I have found for $100. The balance could be better because if the neck is extended it could tip and the red cone is very hot. It works well and both my wife and I use it.
customer_reviews.author: James T. Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: This lamp works well for me
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is lightweight but sturdy with a large base that keeps it from tipping over. I use it on my ankle several times a day, while reading or watching television. The operation is simple and it has a handy timer. The remote control feature would be very convenient for use on ones back.
customer_reviews.author: Susan G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, I am using it everyday to recover from my knee surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Leesummer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and was really excited for it to arrive. The red light bulb that comes with it did not work but I called the company and they sent a new bulb right away...if the original bulb had works I would have given this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy K

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for this wonderful product. It was for my mother
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for this wonderful product. It was for my mother. When she feels pain in her knee, she uses this lamp to apply heat in her knee. She finds it very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Farhan Shah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great, helped us with so many Little pains here and there
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Schürmann

customer_reviews.title: So good...
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase.I worried for only one thing but thank god signs are not Korean as on product page( English:).I am a dental tech and i am using this for different purpose but works great with heavy duty work.I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cevik

customer_reviews.title: Use it at my physiotherapy practice daily
customer_reviews.text: I use this item daily on various musculoskeletal problems that I see within my practice setting. This is actually the second one that I am buying - I loved it that much that I needed 2. We do ensure that both the patients and therapist use protective eyewear - which I don't think the manufacturers emphasized enough. Overall I highly recommend this product for use by professionals or with the guidance of a professional.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. T

customer_reviews.title: Effective lamp for trade show demo - Came with non-functioning bulb.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this desk model heat lamp to give us an infra-red heat source for demonstrations at a trade show. The rather costly bulb that came with the lamp was defective, but fortunately, we purchased a back-up. Apart from that the lamp was very effective in demonstrating how highly reflective aluminum coatings can almost completely block Infrared heat.
customer_reviews.author: DDeiganTop Contributor: Cycling

product_meta.title: Infrared Heat Lamp Desk Model(Heat Therapy & Light Therapy) 110 V. including Bulb + 6mo. Warranty, (free Shipping), Made in Korea
product_meta.description: Each Infrared Lamp includes a 1 page manual (double sided). The manual lists instructions for operating the lamp. **IMPORTANT: Please make sure to wear light clothing when using to prevent burns. DO NOT USE ON BARE SKIN. *NOTE: Please do not exert excessive force when inserting the bulb into the socket as the bulb may crack.** The lamp base is 12 x 13 inches. When the remote controller is plugged in, the main control panel is disabled. WARRANTY INFORMATION 6 Months Limited Warranty of Parts (Not including Bulb) and Labor Only. Freight cost is not included in the warranty. 11 lbs,(21x17x13") - Dimensions for Packing Box
feature_bullets: Infrared Heat Lamp/ADJUSTABLE NECK adjustable heat with easy maneuver dial control, 110V Height 31
Durable quiet timer clockwise up to 60 minutes, Covered Lamp as a plate for protection against heat.
Important: Please make sure to wear light clothing when using to prevent burns. DO NOT USE ON BARE SKIN.
Note: Please do not exert excessive force when inserting the bulb into the socket as the bulb may crack.
